name: Ext_R5_AuditEvent_en_de_value
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.AuditEvent.entity.detail.value[x] for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents AuditEvent.entity.detail.value[x] from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/AuditEvent|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.definition: The  value of the extra detail.
element.comment: `AuditEvent.entity.detail.value[x]` maps to R4B `AuditEvent.entity.detail.value[x]`. Type `Quantity` has no mapping Type `CodeableConcept` has no mapping Type `boolean` has no mapping Type `integer` has no mapping Type `Range` has no mapping Type `Ratio` has no mapping Type `time` has no mapping Type `dateTime` has no mapping Type `Period` has no mapping So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.
